title: CPA Raises Alarm Bells Over Hookless Tires, Rims: ‘One Day There will be a Mass Crash’
content:
Adam Hansen points out crash at UAE Tour as latest example: 'This crash is why the CPA are 100 percent against hookless rims.'

Read the full article at CPA Raises Alarm Bells Over Hookless Tires, Rims: ‘One Day There will be a Mass Crash’ on Velo.
author: sstokes
